channel.title: romance car on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in romance car on Barefoot Rob

item.title: free bus ride with babychan
item.description: 21:17 Saturday 17 February 2018 JST After work today, Lin and I met at the station and as a little “romantic” gift, I bought reserved seats so we could take Romance Car to our station. It was nice to just be able to relax all the way home. Curiously, when Lin tried to pay for my bus fare, it wouldn’t go through so the driver just let us on the bus free.
